---
title: District Fact Template for Title I
description: District Fact Template for Title I Data Documentation
---
import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';
import TemplateCard from '@site/src/components/templateCard/templateCard';

<TemplateCard
  fields={11}
  collected={8}
  targetTables={['DISTRICT_FACT']}
  dependencies={[]}
/>
<br />

:::note
Each LEA must provide a response for each question in [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx). 
:::

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `REPORTING DATE`

---
### 3 - CATEGORY 1
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={6} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.

`TAS`
</details>

---
### 4 - CATEGORY 2
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.

`GRADE`
</details>

---
### 5 - CATEGORY 3
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={7} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.

`KDG`
</details>

---
### 6 - MEASURE TYPE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={7} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.

`COUNT`
</details>

---
### 7 - COUNT
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={7} /></p>

If MEASURE TYPE = `COUNT`, the count should be supplied in this field.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2`
</details>

---
### 8-10
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 11 - CATEGORY 4
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AE](docs/appendix/appendix-AE.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.

`TITLE1STUD`
</details>


## Rules
See the Rules Section of the Template Domain for rules consistent throughout all templates


## Sample
**Sample Title I Submission for the District Fact Template**

:::note
note that NC stands for Not Collected
:::

| **Submitting AUN** | **School Year Date** | **Category 1** | **Category 2** | **Category 3** | **Measure Type** | **Count** | **AMOUNT** | **%** | **NC** | **Category 4** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** |
